title: Ticket #3414: condor_q should be able to analyze machine START expressions
description:
When machines have complex expressions regarding the jobs that they will accept, current analysis code provides no useful information. It is common for glide-ins to have complex START expressions.

condor_q should have an option to request analysis from the perspective of the machine rather than from the perspective of the job.

two new switches will be added

  • -reverse to be used with -analyze, analyzes the machine's Requirements rather than the jobs Requirements.

  • -machineconstraint to be use with -analyze, used to specify a machine name, slot name, or constraint expression.
